Student and Technology Enthusiast

Hello! I'm João Pacheco, a 21-year-old passionate about technology. I live in Paredes, Porto, Portugal, I've always been fascinated by technology since childhood.

When I'm not coding or solving technical challenges, I enjoy recharging by hanging out with friends, watching news and videos, and exploring new music.
